name: Revenge Is a Dish Best Served Three Times
writer: Matt Groening (created by), James L. Brooks (developed by), Matt Groening (developed by), Sam Simon (developed by), Joel H. Cohen
actors: Dan Castellaneta, Julie Kavner, Nancy Cartwright, Yeardley Smith
plot: While Homer tries to get revenge on a driver who cut him off, his family warns him of the folly of revenge by telling stories based on "The Count of Monte Cristo," "Revenge of the Nerds," and "Batman."
